name: ClickFever
description:
Description :

Click on cube to earn score and time depending of the color.  Avoid sphere if you want to stay alive.  If you have 42sec left it converts 30 sec into one life.  Much score you have, less time you have to react and click.
Be fast, accurate  and enjoy this small game and the electro ambiance.

Links :

Don't forget to check my Twitter : @Fox13440 !

Informations : Best score is 864 It is possible that controls don't work on the first launch, to fix that go to "settings" then "controls" then "reset" and finally "apply". I will fix that as soon as possible. Made with Unreal Engine 4
